title: Content Authenticity Assertion Credential
description: A Verifiable Credential that aggregates multiple content-related credentials into a single authenticity record.

id.description: DID of the aggregated VC instance.

issuer.description: DID of the entity issuing the aggregated credential.

contentId.description: Unique ID of the associated content.

includedCredentials.description: DID references to modular Verifiable Credentials included in this authenticity record.

contentDetails.description: DID DLR URI of the Content Details VC.

identityClaims.description: DID DLR URI of the Identity Claims VC.

extendedMetadata.description: DID DLR URI of the Extended Metadata VC.

aiPermissions.description: DID DLR URI of the AI Permissions VC.

contentSigning.description: DID DLR URI of the Content Signing VC.

verificationStatus.description: Current verification status of the aggregated credential.

proof.description: Cryptographic proof for the aggregated credential.

type.description: Proof type (e.g., JSON-LD Signature, EdDSA Signature, zk-SNARK Proof).

verificationMethod.description: DID or method used to verify this proof.
